Articles.Content:
I made this rocket designed to burn the Kerbs, but after they died, something very strange happened... (Didn\'t know this would/could happen!)

I used Mechjeb and the plywood flyer, i do not take credit for any of the mods or game.

As you can see it started to go back to the Vehicle Assembly Building, But then it cut the engine off and died.
The panic button in MechJeb activates the auto land feature, and it can control unfocused ships.

The panic button in MechJeb activates the auto land feature, and it can control unfocused ships.

Ooooh! Thats what that is! Thanks! This will be lots of fun ;P
